overview:
As Vice President of Interactive Design and Media Branding, Dorian oversees all of the visual designs, from Celebrity Influencer sites to Branded Content sites. Before joining EQAL in early 2011, Dorian was Art Director at a top level Hollywood ad agency where he designed street marketing campaigns for films such as Iron Man, Transformers, Jackass: Number 2, Nacho Libre and brands like Nestle and Mazda.

Growing up in Los Angeles, Dorian at an early age was fascinated with TV ads, movie posters, billboards and knew that one way or another, his place was in the entertainment industry.

When he’s not passionately talking about design or pointing at pixels on the screen, Dorian spends his time with his wife and kids.

relationships.title: VP, Interactive Design and Media Branding
